---
title: Lulu Arrays --- Size
---

## Introduction

If you have imported the {lulu.Array} class as
```lua
local Array = require 'lulu.Array'
```
then you have access to the following trivial size methods:

**`Array:size()`** <br>
Returns the number of *top-level* items in `self`.

**`Array:is_empty(tbl)`** <br>
Returns `true` if `self` is empty.
